advertising_content:
The team attaches great importance to the quality of user experience. When you use this app for fifteen days, you can open the advertising management function. At that time, you will be able to freely set whether to display ads. 

Accumulated days:
advertising_15D_ago_content: Although advertising revenue is the main income of the team, considering that the current advertising format seriously affects the cleanliness of the layout, the user is provided with control rights to open/close ad before the team optimizes the advertising format.
open_at_scheduled_time_content: When opening the app, the system will switch themes according to the set time.
click_on_the_screen_to_close_the_teachin: Click on the screen to close the teaching
swipe_left_or_right_to_view: Swipe left or right to view the previous/next user
swipe_up_to_see_the_same: Swipe up to see the same story on Instagram
swipe_down_to_leave: Swipe down to leave the full screen
click_left/right:
Click on the left half: previous story
Click on the right half: next story
long_press_on_the_screen: Long press on the screen to pause the video
tap_the_story_to_enter_full_screen: Tap the story to enter full screen mode
long_press_the_story_to_zoom: Long press the story to zoom in quickly
long_press_user_profile_to_call: Long press user profile to call up more options
give_us_a_review_content: Your support is the source of motivation for this team. Can you take five seconds to rate it?
questionnaire_content: Thank you for using Story Viewer. Can I interrupt you for a minute to fill out the questionnaire for us?
